title: Series A Preferred Stock Purchase Agreement

obligations.description: must redeem shares if no qualified IPO by January 1, 2030
obligations.penalty_for_breach: redemption price includes accrued but unpaid dividends

obligations.description: participate in the company sale if approved by majority holders

special_terms: Quarterly unaudited and annual audited financial statements
Right to maintain ownership percentage in future financings
Weighted average anti-dilution protection in down rounds
Participating Preferred: Investors participate pro-rata in remaining proceeds
40% of proceeds for product development, 35% for sales and marketing, 15% for operations and administration, 10% for working capital reserve
termination_conditions: If no qualified IPO by January 1, 2030
